name: tm02
effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Headbutt Gen I: Razor Wind)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Sharp, huge claws hook and slash the foe quickly and with great power.

flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Sharp, huge claws hook and slash the foe quickly and with great power.
